content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
### Errors when using boiler
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a boiler before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using burner mining drill
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine has input liquid before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure that the burner inserter has fuel before attempting to use it.
